com.example.meditrackr.utils

Class SaveLoad

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.meditrackr.utils.SaveLoad

  • public class SaveLoad
extends java.lang.Object
    this class can load profiles, save profiles and create a new profile to load a new profile the class uses loadProfile which will search for the profile using a username and return either a careProvider profile or a patient profile. if no profile is found it will throw an exception (java.io.IOException | java.lang.ClassNotFoundException) to save a profile the class will use saveProfile. to do this it will take the username from the given profile and then overwrite the new profile data onto and the old profile date. if something goes wrong it throws an error(java.io.IOException) to add a new profile the class will use addNewProfile this will take a profile with information already in it and save it to disk.

      SaveLoad()

      static void saveProfile(android.content.Context context, Profile profile)

        this function will search for the profile using a username and return either a careProvider profile or a patient profile. if no profile is found it will throw an exception

        username - username of the profile to look for
        Returns:
        either a careprovider profile or a patient profile
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - | java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        See Also:

      • saveProfile

        public static void saveProfile(android.content.Context context,
                               Profile profile)
        this function it will take the username from the given profile and then overwrite the new profile data onto and the old profile date. if something goes wrong it throws an error
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the controller
        profile - the profile with the newly edited info
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addNewProfile

        public static boolean addNewProfile(android.content.Context context,
                                    Profile profile)
        attempts to add a new profile to the database
        Parameters:
        context - context of the controller
        profile - the profile data that the user created
        Returns:
        returns true if profile was created or false if it already exists
